section.name: Advanced
section.p: Hippo ECM provides almost endless possibilities to organize and publish your content. The JCR interface gives developers the freedom to build any imaginable application on top of Hippo ECM. This section describes how to get started. In addition, this section provides examples of some use cases of Hippo ECM in a variety of environment.

ul.li: JCR Interface - Learn how to get low level access to your content through the JCR interface
Dropbox Demo - Learn how to import content and work with metadata and facets, all through the JCR interface
